Author: CardiographicDuck
Text: One time I was in the kitchen about to eat dinner (this was at the height of my anorexia, so eating dinner was a big step for me), and my grandmother, mom and I were talking. Somehow my butt was brought up and one thing led to another and my grandmother ended up saying (about my body or butt, whatever), “It’s more like a pig’s.”   I ran to my bedroom crying.    Family can be rough on weight, for some reason. I don’t know why.

Author: BabyBaphomet_
Text: 5'6 and 138 is a totally healthy weight!          Mom's can be the worst about diet advice sometimes :/ I'm really sorry.
